data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 4,600 souls in Eschen and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eschen, Liechtenstein

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Eschen.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Eschen, Liechtenstein will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 4,600 people living in Eschen, Liechtenstein. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 26 believers in Eschen to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Eschen.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Eschen, Liechtenstein.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eschen, Liechtenstein has a population of 4,600.

We estimate Eschen has 26 people who might know Jesus, 3,570 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,004 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.
